name: Skellington's Cave
description:
Controls:

  • Movement : WASD
  • Cast Spells: left click = fire spell; right click = Ice spell
  • Point the mouse in the direction you would like to cast your spell.
  • The further the mouse is from the player, the further your spell will reach

Game play:

Rescue the Doggo inside the cave. Use spells to freeze and burn the skeletons. Be sure to use the Tree of Healing before entering the cave.
